title: Week 7 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 10/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 7 gambling advice, covering all 13 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Patriots-Jets (4:30), Raiders-Packers (7:05), 49ers-Redskins (15:30), Rams-Falcons (20:00), Cardinals-Giants (25:45), Ravens-Seahawks (28:35), Saints-Bears (31:45), Eagles-Cowboys (38:20), Texans-Colts (40:15), Chargers-Titans (41:45), Dolphins-Bills (46:50), Vikings-Lions (49:05), and Jaguars-Bengals (53:25).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
